channel.title: General (new threads)
channel.description: Threads in the forum category "General" - General BvS Discussion

item.title: Pachinko Designs
item.description: A place to share designs and suggested designs for the Pachinko Machine
item.content:encoded: As someone who is working on designing a Pachinko Machine I thought this might be a place for people to share their machine designs and suggestion.

item.title: created my own village.
item.description: But I lack helpers and snake oils
item.content:encoded: I created my own village recently and I lack helpers and snake oils what am I supposed to do to deal with this?

item.title: The Bingo page
item.description: Page for anyone that needs to be bingo'ed with a note page
item.content:encoded:
Ok people, here's how it works.
You place you in-game name, village, season and lvl here when you ask for a bingo.
Once you answered the bingo request and bingo'ed the target you reply to the request by leaving a message including in-game name and village.

And to make the first request.:
I'm requesting a bingo by note page on my character Glennos of Keyblades Village Lvl 73 S3

item.title: Note bingo please
item.content:encoded:
Nickname is Jransan
Pirates village
Will return if needed

item.title: Need note page bingo for Anon
item.content:encoded:
Username: Kamikazee
Village: Offline Village
Tier 2

Will return the favour if needed.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Note Page Bingo Me Please
item.content:encoded: I would greatly appreciate it, I am in Glacier village my names chuko

item.content:encoded:

Ty very much

item.title: the point of alt characters
item.content:encoded: alright, I've been playing for a little while now, but I haven't really been able to find anything that really details or explains the usefulness and point of having alts. what I mean is, what good do they do you/your main?

item.title: Note page bingo'ing
item.content:encoded: Can someone bingo me with a note page please, I'm at Raftel Village. I'm willing to do the same to anyone else.

item.title: Note page bingo!
item.content:encoded: Could anybody spare the time to note page bingo me please? I am doing The Trade. My bvs character is wkayli from Light Village (3 tier). Level 62 at the moment. Any help is appreciated. =)

item.title: plzzz ...can someone bingo me with a note page.....
item.content:encoded: plzzz …can someone bingo me with a note page…..

item.title: Login Problem
item.content:encoded: When I go to login, I have alot of problems. It keeps telling me the 4-character code is wrong and I have to go through a whole ordeal with it. If anyone can help remedy this problem, I'd really appeciate it.

item.title: How long after my BvS-account gets removed?
item.content:encoded:
Question is in the thread title: 'How long after my BvS-account gets removed?'

I ask this because I'm losing a bit of interest in Billy but I want to keep my account for when I want to play again. If it get's deleted after a month of idling I would only have to log in once a month instead of a day, which is what I do right now.

item.title: can't log in somehow
item.content:encoded:
my character somehow was deleted or something like that ..
its naruto14

i cant loq in
but in this forum he exist but as a world kaqe in season 128 and level 520

item.title: Doujutsu AP items/jutsu/allies
item.content:encoded:
I wanted to level my Doujutsu, which is rather low.
But I was wondering if there were any items or jutsu's or allies that could make the leveling go faster. I already checked the Allies page and found none, but perhaps I missed something.

Anything you know is appreciated.

item.title: Strength
item.description: I'm a Jounin and I don;t understand what strength does....
item.content:encoded: Can anyone explain how strength benefits you and how it helps you, whether it helps you in a specific way or genreally….

item.title: Regular Mission Items/Themes Bonus
item.description: Doujutsu is not a Regular mission ?
item.content:encoded:
just curios about Regular Mission (G/N/T) vs Burger/Pizzawitch (D).

if D stat is not a Regular Mission better if there is any info about this in that items bonus.
